title: $:/plugins/tg/list-bullet2-button
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/list-bullet2": { "created": "20181104141902252", "text": "<$action-sendmessage\n\t$message=\"tm-edit-text-operation\"\n\t$param=\"prefix-lines\"\n\tcharacter=\"*\"\n\tcount=\"2\"\n/>\n", "title": "$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/list-bullet2", "tags": "$:/tags/EditorToolbar", "icon": "$:/core/images/list-bullet2", "caption": "{{$:/language/Buttons/ListBullet2/Caption}}", "description": "{{$:/language/Buttons/ListBullet2/Hint}}", "condition": "[!has[type]] [type[text/vnd.tiddlywiki]]", "shortcuts": "((list-bullet2))", "modified": "20181104181333340" }, "$:/core/images/list-bullet2": { "created": "20181031110533939", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "", "title": "$:/core/images/list-bullet2", "tags": "$:/tags/Image", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20230807182525646" }, "$:/config/shortcuts/list-bullet2": { "created": "20181104150902532", "title": "$:/config/shortcuts/list-bullet2", "modified": "20181104181848706", "text": "ctrl-shift-K" }, "$:/config/ShortcutInfo/list-bullet2": { "created": "20181104150615521", "title": "$:/config/ShortcutInfo/list-bullet2", "modified": "20181104181655395", "text": "{{$:/language/Buttons/ListBullet2/Hint}}" }, "$:/language/Buttons/ListBullet2/Caption": { "created": "20181104150440517", "title": "$:/language/Buttons/ListBullet2/Caption", "modified": "20181104181129740", "text": "2nd level bulleted list" }, "$:/language/Buttons/ListBullet2/Hint": { "created": "20181104150525887", "title": "$:/language/Buttons/ListBullet2/Hint", "modified": "20181104181205789", "text": "Apply 2nd level bulleted list formatting to lines containing selection" }, "$:/plugins/tg/list-bullet2-button/readme": { "created": "20181104144041084", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "\\define icn(icon)\n\n\\end\n\nA button (<>) that applies 2nd level bulleted list formatting to lines containing selection.
\nAssigned shortcut: {{$:/config/shortcuts/list-bullet2}}\n\nYou can apply 2nd level bulleted list formating to\n\n* plain text\n* bulleted lists\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/list-bullet2-button/readme", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20210104173241260" }, "$:/plugins/tg/list-bullet2-button/license": { "created": "20210103202953779", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "[[2nd level bulleted list button|http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_playground.html]] © Ton Gerner — 2018-2023\n\nMIT License: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/list-bullet2-button/license", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20221229084801994" } } }
author: TonGerner
creator: TonGerner
name: 2nd level bulleted list button
